sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Boeing ( BA ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.5%.
Year to date, Boeing has lost about 11.7% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Intel ( INTC ), trading down 1.3%.
Intel is showing a gain of 28.5% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Chevron ( CVX ), trading down 1.1%, and Home Depot ( HD ), trading up 0.3% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
